definition[0]: in every part of a particular area, place etc
example[0]: a large organization with offices throughout the world
example[1]: The disease spread rapidly throughout Europe.
example[2]: The house is in excellent condition, with fitted carpets throughout.
definition[1]: during all of a particular period, from the beginning to the end
example[3]: We are open every weekend throughout the year.
example[4]: He was involved in politics throughout his life.
example[5]: The debate continued, but Meredith remained silent throughout.
